node.title: Regions with low vax rates at risk of being cut off from rest of WA, McGowan warns
node.alt: WA Premier Mark McGowan, wearing a dark suit and sporting a neat haircut, speaks to the media.
node.description: The Premier issued the warning during his visit to the Pilbara, which has the lowest vaccination rates in the country.
node.content:
["Tourists could be blocked from visiting Western Australia's north and unvaccinated residents may be restricted\u00a0from returning home if the region's vaccination rates remain\u00a0low, Mark McGowan says.", "The Premier issued the warning\u00a0during his visit to the Pilbara, which has the\u00a0lowest vaccination rates in the country.", "About 50 per cent of residents have received a single dose and only about 37 per cent are fully vaccinated.", "WA plans to relax its hard border in January or February, but Mr McGowan said it was likely that regional areas with low vaccination rates would be closed off from the rest of the state once it reopened.", "\"It is more likely that double dose vaccinated people would be able to come in and out,\" he said.", "\"If you're not double dose vaccinated you won't be able to come in.", "", "
The Premier says the state may have to impose restrictions again if the vaccination rate doesn't improve.(ABC Pilbara: Laura Birch)
", "
'So unfair'
", "Mr McGowan said tourists could also face restrictions.", "\"We'd have to have a look at tourists if they were double dose vaccinated, because of course tourists can still spread the virus,\" he said.", "\"So they're the sorts of rules that we're currently working out.\"", "He said a decision on whether certain regions would need to be closed off would be made after a date was set for opening the state's border.", "Shire of Ashburton president Kerry White said she was horrified to hear that the Pilbara could be closed off.", "\"It's so unfair to the Pilbara to do this to us, to threaten us like this,\" she said.", "", "
Evan Hall is worried about the impact of regional border restrictions.(ABC News: Hugh Sando)
", "
Tourism sector fears
", "Tourism Council WA chief executive Evan Hall said the prospect of\u00a0travel restrictions being reinstated was troubling.\u00a0\u00a0", "\"If the Pilbara was shut down for regional travel it would slice the north of WA in half,\" he said.", "\"We'd actually be stopping tour buses, and just West Australians driving north in their four wheel drives and caravans \u2014 they'd have to stop at the Pilbara and wouldn't be able to make it to Broome.\"", "", "
Tourists\u00a0flocked to\u00a0Karijini National Park during the pandemic.(Supplied: Tourism WA)
", "Mackerel Islands and the Karijini Eco Retreat chief executive Drew Norrish said people had been falling in love with the Pilbara since the pandemic began and that coach companies on the east coast had already started booking accommodation for next year.", "\"We'll lose all of those\u00a0people again,\" he said.", "", "
COVID Commander Chris Dawson hopes influential elders will help to combat vaccine hesitancy.(ABC Pilbara: Verity Gorman)
", "
Door-to-door\u00a0blitz
", "Vaccine Commander Chris Dawson said\u00a0health authorities would be ramping up efforts to improve the state's Indigenous vaccination rate over the next five weeks, including going door-to-door in communities with low immunisation figures.", "\"This effort is going to be targeted specifically to further engage with Aboriginal leaders and communities,\" he said.", "\"So that means that we will be going door-to-door, and if they don't take it up the first time because they've got some doubts or lack of information, we will sit down and engage with them.\"", "Mr Dawson said the\u00a0Northern Territory's outbreak highlighted the urgent need to boost Indigenous vaccination rates.", "He said some people had recently travelled from WA to Katherine for a funeral\u00a0and were required to get tested and isolate when they returned.", "\"That is a real life example happening right now that demonstrates to people \u2014\u00a0you've got to be vaccinated,\" he said.", "", "
COVID cases surging across several European countries
"]
